description.value: You or your ancestors were born on a world controlled by the Azlanti Star Empire. You may have prominent brows, purple eyes, or a widow's peak. Choose one cantrip from the arcane spell list. You can cast this spell as an arcane innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up. You can change this cantrip to a different one from the same list once per day by meditating to draw on the power of your runic blood; this is a 10-minute activity that has the concentrate trait.
